description: Present students with the latest research in foundational areas of electronic commerce/online business. Critically analyse current research in electronic commerce/online business.
prerequisites: 2 units of BISM/INFS/MGTS course + permission from Head of School
restricted:
BCom(Hons), GCResMeth, GDipResMeth, MCom, PhD, MPhil.
Quota: Minimum of 10 enrolments
